## pathJoin() function

Joins two strings `start` and `end` with a `separator`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function pathJoin(start: string, end: string, separator?: string): string;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  start | string |  |
|  end | string |  |
|  separator | string | <i>(Optional)</i> |

<b>Returns:</b>

string

The joined path.
